title: [原创]Install Linux, Nukkit And NetBeansIDE on Android
author: eangta
txt_content:
本帖最后由 beangta 于 2018-9-23 23:36 编辑 

Hello all, I am Vietnamese. Of course I do not know Chinese, so I hope everyone understands (Google Translate)

Phone you have root (Obligatory)
Internal memory is empty 2GB

1. Install Linux
Install LinuxDeploy on ChPlay
Watching PNG =)) <3




Warning{Phone 64bit set arm64 And Phone32Bit set armhf}








Tick VNC -> Enable And SSH -> Enable

Wanting...20 minute

2.Install VNC And SSH on ChPlay






3.Run Linux install java8
Go to LinuxDeploy
Tick Start, it will run

Goto SSH juice
Run SSH
Press +
Address: localhost
Indenty: {type} New ->> nickname:{Depending on your input} ->>Password
Okay done
You turned it on SSH, take the next step.
name@localhost:~$ su
root@localhost:/home/name# sudo apt-get install default-jre -y
root@localhost:/home/name# sudo apt-get install default-jdk -y
Done.
Goto ChPlay install FX And Add root FX
navigate to the directory data/data/ru.meefik.linuxdeploy/files/rootfs/Create New Folder Nukkit And move file Nukkit.jar In folder Nukkit

Type root@localhost:/home/name# cd /Nukkit
root@localhost:/Nukkit# java -jar Nukkit.jar
Done =)))
4.Install NetBeansIDE
Run VNC install NetBeansIDE
download and type command
chmod +x netbeans.sh
./netbeans.sh
 Fix NetBeansIDE not run
Link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/fngo5c1xqday8u1/netbeans.conf?dl=0
copy to /usr/local/netbeans/etc/ paster





Good Luck 
Chúc B?n May M?n
